properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 1:01PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...West to southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55
mph.

* WHERE...The Cody/Clark area.

* WHEN...Through New Year's Day.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be difficult over Highway 120,
especially for high profile vehicles. Strong cross winds will
enhance the blowover risk for lightweight and high profile
vehicles, including camping trailers. Gusts up to 60 also
possible near Clark.

NWSheadline: Strong Gusty Winds through New Year's Day
